name: IF - Mafiafell
description:
Welcome to Ebott City.

Play as a customizable  "Frisk" trying to survive in a mafia-run city while looking for your missing brother. 

The story:

Your brother has been missing for five years, the only clue you have has led you to Ebott City; a city as beautiful as it is dangerous. 

As you continue your search, you unexpectedly catch the wrong kind of attention. 

The routes:

Platonic / Friendship / Aroace route: No romance will be initiated on either parties.

Sans route: You catch the sharp attention of mafia member, Sans. His interest in you boarders on obsession, and his hot temper makes him unpredictable to you.

Wingding route: You catch the unwilling attention of mafia boss, Wingding. Cold, calculating, and deceptively manipulative, you aren't sure all your choices are yours to make. 

Papyrus route: You catch the surprising attention of mafia member, Papyrus. He seems harmless enough... or so you initially thought.

Asriel route: You catch the happy attention of a monster named Asriel. He's always fun to be around, so you think you can trust him. 

Disclaimer

Undertale belongs to Toby Fox. 

Mafiafell is the combination of Mafiatale and Underfell. The AU is written by Staringback** and the comic was made by Cutthroat-Jutsu on Deviantart and by Melikas on Twitter / Tapas.

This twine game was written & coded by Darkpetal16. 

Ngl, I just really wanted to see a happy ending for Sooner or Later You'll Be Mine and since it hasn't updated since 2019... here we are.
